name: Sean Burk's Wild Hammers
description:
A local cooperative/competitive sportstable-like experience

Have fun with your friends! In the same room! Swinging Hammers! In a safe and consensual way!

I won't take your money for this game probably ever, but if you want to give me money so I can continue to work on this and hopefully other stuff I will definitely take it.

Plan on adding, as time allows:

  • Computer opponents/teammates
  • Online matchmaking
  • A bunch of other features, that I shan't spoil here...

Version 0.1.1 

Requires at least two Windows compatible controllers

Love,

Sean

P.S. please let me know about bugs and I will squash them as I can

P.P.S. I will make a Mac and/or HTML5 build if people want it
